video.title: Invizimals
video.synopsis: A band of intrepid adventures sets out to learn the secrets of the Invizimals, invisible creatures who live all around us in a parallel existence.

episodes.synopsis: New recruit Hiro has a hard time adjusting to the Alliance. But when he has to face an X-Tractor invasion, he gets the Invizimal Tigershark's help.
episodes.title: The Alliance I

episodes.synopsis: After the Z1s barely make it out alive from a botched mission to the Inviziworld, Keni discovers that Tigershark has come back to Earth with him.
episodes.title: The Alliance II

episodes.synopsis: Tigershark tells the Z1s that the Invizimals need Hiro's help: The X-Tractors have taken over a sacred site that must be recaptured.
episodes.title: The Alliance III

episodes.synopsis: While investigating an energy source in an Inviziworld desert, the Z1 discovers a subterranean temple guarded by an Invizimal named Überjackal.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Dimensions I

episodes.synopsis: When an X-Tractor squad breaks into the Temple of Light, Überjackal refuses help from the kids. Lima hatches a plan to find Tigershark.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Dimensions II

episodes.synopsis: As Überjackal and Tigershark fight, the X-Tractors surround the temple. A wounded Überjackal escapes deeper into the temple with the staff of Anubis.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Dimensions III

episodes.synopsis: When Otomo is zapped into the Alliance HQ, Hiro convinces him it's part of a virtual game. Now he wants to face the X-Tractors in the Invizimal world!
episodes.title: Best Game Ever

episodes.synopsis: Hiro has a date, but he has to exchange appearances with an Invizimal during a mission, so Sam goes on the date disguised as Hiro.
episodes.title: Mission Ice Cream

episodes.synopsis: The Z1s go to Mexico to investigate strange stories about "El Gran Mendoza," an unbeaten wrestler whose superstrength could be Invizimal-related.
episodes.title: El Gran Mendoza

episodes.synopsis: A surprise party for Sam goes wrong when Hiro, Lima and Tigershark get stuck and the 3-meter-high Invizimal can't operate his stealth system.
episodes.title: A Tigershark in a China Shop

episodes.synopsis: Scores of Terracotta Warrior statues are missing. The unit tracks them to Invizimal Xiaong Mao, who plans to reanimate them to defeat the X-Tractors.
episodes.title: Terracotta Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Lima reverts back to her teenage self when she comes in contact with a strange Invizimal and becomes obsessed with gossip, clothes and Dustin Viva.
episodes.title: Jestered

episodes.synopsis: Sam considers leaving the Alliance and taking an internship with mysterious philanthropist Mr. Black, unaware that he's behind the X-Tractors.
episodes.title: Welcome Mr. Black
